verses.name: 2 Timothy 1:5
verses.text: When I call to remembrance the unfeigned faith that is in thee, which dwelt first in thy grandmother Lois, and thy mother Eunice; and I am persuaded that in thee also.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 1:6
verses.text: Wherefore I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift of God, which is in thee by the putting on of my hands.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 1:7
verses.text: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind.
